lb-is_achievement, #id_is_achievement:
Marks this Accomplishment as a Special Achievement.
(They will be highlighted in yellow.)
lb-measurement, #id_measurement:
The short-form of the unit that is used for
a precise measurement of your Accomplishment.
(Meters, minutes etc.).
Optional
timeframe-section:
Specify either the completion date or time frame of the Accomplishment.
Optional, leave unchanged if you accomplished it today.
(Default: Today)
